metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v8.10.0 - Fixed Gemini CLI headless mode (Issue #25): stdin-based prompt delivery avoids OS arg limits, -p flag for reliable headless execution, -o text clean output, --approval-mode yolo replaces deprecated -y. Context budget enforcement after all injections. 31 personas, 38 commands, 43 skills. Run /octo:setup.
